name: R5-Group-R4B-Group
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Group into FHIR R4B

target.comment: R5 `Group` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group`

element.display: Whether this group's record is in active use

target.display: Whether this group's record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `Group.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.active`

element.display: Include / Exclude group members by Trait

target.display: Include / Exclude group members by Trait
target.comment: R5 `Group.characteristic` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic`
R5 `Group.characteristic.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic.code`
R5 `Group.characteristic.exclude` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic.exclude`

R5 `Group.characteristic.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.characteristic.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Group.characteristic.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Group.characteristic.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.characteristic.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Period over which characteristic is tested

target.display: Period over which characteristic is tested
target.comment: R5 `Group.characteristic.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic.period`
R5 `Group.characteristic.value[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.characteristic.value[x]`
R5 `Group.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.code`
R5 `Group.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.contained`

element.display: Natural language description of the group

target.comment: R5 `Group.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Group.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.id`
R5 `Group.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Group.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.implicitRules`
R5 `Group.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Group.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Entity that is the custodian of the Group's definition

target.display: Entity that is the custodian of the Group's definition
target.comment: R5 `Group.managingEntity` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.managingEntity`

element.display: Who or what is in group

target.display: Who or what is in group
target.comment: R5 `Group.member` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.member`
R5 `Group.member.entity` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Group.member.entity` - entity has change due to type change: R5 `entity` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `entity`

R5 `Group.member.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.member.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Group.member.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.member.id`

element.display: If member is no longer in group

target.display: If member is no longer in group
target.comment: R5 `Group.member.inactive` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.member.inactive`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Group.member.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.member.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Period member belonged to the group

target.display: Period member belonged to the group
target.comment: R5 `Group.member.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.member.period`
R5 `Group.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.meta`

R5 `Group.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Group.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `Group.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.name`
R5 `Group.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.quantity`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Group.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.text`

element.display: person | animal | practitioner | device | careteam | healthcareservice | location | organization | relatedperson | specimen

target.display: person | animal | practitioner | device | medication | substance
target.comment: R5 `Group.type` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Group.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/group-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/group-type|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
